OOC: I think thats illegal to be "Huge" You cant be larger than 16 feet 
unless its a gestalt form. SO if megaton can grow to the same size he can 
grow to a maximum of 16 feet... Or at least thats what the rules say.

--part1_26.193b59f9.289e9887_boundary
